    • Method Detail

      • detectSentences

        String[] detectSentences(File file,
                       Charset cs)
                         throws IOException
        Read the content from the specified file and return a list of detected sentences.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to read
        cs - the file charset
        Returns:
        the detected sentences
        Throws:
        IOException - If an error occurs while loading the file

      • detectSentences

        String[] detectSentences(String content)
        Break the given content/corpus into sentences.

        The sentence detector is lazily initialized on first use.

        Parameters:
        content - the text corpus
        Returns:
        the detected sentences in string array

      • tokenize

        String[] tokenize(String sentence)
        Tokenize the given sentence.

        The tokenizer is lazily initialized on first use.

        Parameters:
        sentence - a sentence to tokenize
        Returns:
        the individual tokens

      • tagPartOfSpeech

        String[] tagPartOfSpeech(String[] tokens)
        Detect the part of speech tags for the given tokens in a sentence.

        The tagger is lazily initialized on first use.

        Parameters:
        tokens - an array of sentence tokens to tag
        Returns:
        the individual part-of-speech tags

      • findNamedEntities

        List<opennlp.tools.util.Span> findNamedEntities(String sentence,
                                              String[] tokens)
        Find named entities in a tokenized sentence.

        Must call #clearNamedEntityAdaptiveData() after finding all named entities in a single document.

        Parameters:
        sentence - the sentence text
        tokens - the sentence tokens
        Returns:
        a collection of named entity references

      • findEntityMentions

        opennlp.tools.coref.DiscourseEntity[] findEntityMentions(String[] sentences)
        Find Discourse entities (entity mentions) in a document.
        Parameters:
        sentences - the document sentences
        Returns:
        the recognized discourse entities.

      • parseSentence

        opennlp.tools.parser.Parse parseSentence(String text)
        Convert the provided sentence and corresponding tokens into a parse tree.
        Parameters:
        text - the sentence text
        Returns:
        the parse tree

        Returns:
